title: They used to call it sandy blight
creator_credit: Douglas Stanley and Nomad Films International
brief_description: Designed to reveal the problem of trachoma and other serious eye diseases common to outback Aborigines. Health problems, housing and general living conditions are also looked at. Shows how medical attention can help to alleviate problems.
